tit.j: 比叡山ドライブウェイ

sen.j: 比叡山ドライブウェイ（ひえいざんドライブウェイ）は、滋賀県大津市の比叡山にある、京阪電気鉄道の子会社である比叡山自動車道株式会社(京阪グループの項目参照)が運営する自動車道。
sen.e: Mt. Hiei Driveway is a driveway which is managed by Hieizan Jidosha Kabushikigaisha (details are in the page of Keihan Group) which is a subsidiary of Keihan Electric Railway that is located at Mt. Hiei in Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.

Mt. Hiei Driveway is a driveway which is managed by Hieizan Jidosha Kabushikigaisha (details are in the page which detailes the Keihan Group) which is a subsidiary of Keihan Electric Railway that is located at Mt. Hiei in Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.

Mt. Hiei Driveway is a driveway which is managed by Hieizan Jidosha Kabushikigaisha (details are in the page which detailes the Keihan Group) which is a subsidiary of Keihan Electric Railway that is located at Mt. Hiei in Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture.

sen.j: 当項では奥比叡ドライブウェイ（おくひえいドライブウェイ）に関しても取り上げる。
sen.e: This section describes about Okuhiei driveway too.
This section also describes the Okuhiei driveway.
This section also describes the Okuhiei driveway.

sen.j: 比叡山ドライブウェイは、滋賀県大津市の田の谷峠から延暦寺東塔（根本中堂）・比叡山頂を結ぶ約8.1kmの有料道路。
sen.e: Mt. Hiei Driveway is a toll road of approximately 8.1 km which connects Tanotani Pass in Otsu-City higa Prefecture to Enryaku-ji Temple (Konponchudo) and the top of Mt. Hiei.
Mt. Hiei Driveway is a toll road approximately 8.1 km long, which connects Tanotani Pass in Otsu-City higa Prefecture to Enryaku-ji Temple (Konponchudo) and the top of Mt. Hiei.
Mt. Hiei Driveway is a toll road approximately 8.1 km long, which connects Tanotani Pass in Otsu City, Shiga Prefecture to Enryaku-ji Temple (Konpon-chudo Hall) and the top of Mt. Hiei.
sen.cmt: Otsu-City higa Prefecture→Otsu City, Shiga Prefectureに修正、Konponchudo→Konpon-chudo Hallとしました。

sen.j: 比叡山の山腹を走り、途中の「夢見が丘」で大津市街を始めとする琵琶湖の南湖周辺が一望できる。
sen.e: When you drive around the mountainside of Mt. Hiei, you will be able to see the whole view of Otsu City and south part of Biwa Lake on the way at 'Yumemigaoka'.
When driving around the mountainside of Mt. Hiei, one can see the whole of Otsu City and the southern part of Biwa Lake on the way to 'Yumemigaoka'.
When driving around the mountainside of Mt. Hiei, one can see the whole of Otsu City and the southern part of Lake Biwa on the way to 'Yumemigaoka.'
sen.cmt: ピリオドの位置を移動、Lake Biwaとしました。

sen.j: また、同じ京阪グループのホテル「ロテル・ド・比叡」がある。
sen.e: Also there is the hotel 'L'Hotel de Hiei' which is also under the Keihan group.
Also there is the hotel 'L'Hotel de Hiei' which is under the Keihan group as well.
Also there is the hotel 'L'Hotel de Hiei' which is under the Keihan group as well.

sen.j: 奥比叡ドライブウェイは、比叡山ドライブウェイの終点である根本中堂から、延暦寺西塔（釈迦堂）や横川中堂を経由して大津市仰木までを結ぶ約11.8kmの有料道路。
sen.e: Oku Hiei Driveway is a toll road of approximately 11.8 km which connects from Nemoto chudo that is the end of the Mt. Hiei Driveway to Ogi Otsu City via Enryaku-ji Temple east building (Shakado) and Yokokawa Chudo.

Oku Hiei Driveway is a toll road approximately 11.8 km long, which connects Nemoto chudo that is at the end of the Mt. Hiei Driveway to Ogi Otsu City via Enryaku-ji Temple east building (Shakado) to Yokokawa Chudo.

Oku Hiei Driveway is a toll road approximately 11.8 km long, which connects Konpon-chudo Hall that is at the end of the Mt. Hiei Driveway to Ogi, Otsu City via Enryaku-ji Temple west building (Shaka-do Hall) to Yokawa Chu-do Hall.
sen.cmt: 根本中堂、延暦寺西塔（釈迦堂）、横川中堂の読み・表記を修正、Otsu Cityの前にカンマを追加

sen.j: 途中に「比叡山峰道レストラン」がある。
sen.e: On the way, there is the 'Hieizan hodo Restaurant'.
On the way, there is a 'Hieizan hodo Restaurant'.
On the way, there is a 'Hieizan hodo Restaurant.'
sen.cmt: ピリオドの位置を移動

sen.j: なお、大津市・京都市方面からは京阪バス・京都バスが比叡山ドライブバスを運行しているほか、両ドライブウェイ内の比叡山内シャトルバスが運行されており、「比叡山内1日フリー乗車券」も発売されている。
sen.e: And, Keihan Bus and Kyoto Bus runs Mt. Hiei Drive Bus from Otsu City and Kyoto City area, and also Mt. Hiei shuttle bus runs in the both driveway, and 'Mt. Hiei one day free tickets are selling.

The Keihan Bus and Kyoto Bus operate a Mt. Hiei Drive Bus from Otsu City and the Kyoto City area, with a Mt. Hiei shuttle bus also operating along the same route. All day passes to Mt. Hiei are also sold here.

The Keihan Bus and Kyoto Bus operate a Mt. Hiei Drive Bus from Otsu City and the Kyoto City area, with a Mt. Hiei shuttle bus also operating along the same route. All day passes to Mt. Hiei are also sold here.

sen.j: 比叡山ドライブウェイ
区間
田の谷峠料金所 - （夢見が丘） - （ロテル・ド・比叡） - ホテル前検札所 - （比叡山頂への交叉点） - 延暦寺東塔
sen.e: Tanotani Touge tollgate - (Yumemigaoka) - (L'Hotel de Hiei) - checkpoint in front of hotel - (The crossing point to the top to the Mt. Hiei) - Enryaku-ji Temple east building
Tanotani Touge tollgate - (Yumemigaoka) - (L'Hotel de Hiei) - checkpoint in front of the hotel - (The crossing point to the top to the Mt. Hiei) - Enryaku-ji Temple east building
Tanotani Pass tollgate - (Yumemigaoka) - (L'Hotel de Hiei) - checkpoint in front of the hotel - (The crossing point to the top to the Mt. Hiei) - Enryaku-ji Temple east building
sen.cmt: 田の谷峠→前出の表記に合わせ、"Tanotani Pass"としました。

sen.j: （比叡山頂への交叉点） - 比叡山頂
sen.e: (The crossing point to top of the Mt. Hiei) - the top of Mt. Hiei
(The crossing point at the top of Mt. Hiei) - the top of Mt. Hiei
(The crossing point at the top of Mt. Hiei) - the top of Mt. Hiei

sen.e: Enryaku-ji Temple east building - (Enryaku-ji Temple west building) - Nishitani checkpoint - (Enryaku-ji Temple east building) - (Hieizan hodo Restaurant) - (Enryaku-ji Temple chudo) - Ogi tollgate

sen.j: 営業時間外の夜間は通行止めとなる。
sen.e: The night time except business hours are closed

sen.j: 125cc以下の二輪車および自転車、徒歩での利用はできない。
sen.e: Unable to drive with the under 125cc motorcycle, bicycle and walking.
Motorycles under 125 cc, bicycles and pedesterians are not allows.
Motorcycles under 125 cc, bicycles and pedesterians are not allows.

sen.j: 道路には道路照明灯がほとんど存在しない。
sen.e: There are almost no road lights on the road.
There are almost no road lights on the road.
There are almost no road lights on the road.

sen.j: 野生動物が道路上を通行することもある。
sen.e: Sometimes, wild animals pass on the road.
Sometimes, wild animals can be seen on the raod.
Sometimes, wild animals can be seen on the raod.
